title: 1000 wins play with rioter?
body:
Hey so I know it's an old tradition that might've gone out of style, but I always remember seeing that if you got 1000 wins and a decent amount of luck you could play with a rioter. I just noticed that I got my 999th win and was curious if I could win my 1000th with Riot. I have B-tier memes and play Bard/Nunu.

And if you aren't a rioter and wanna play with someone who has B-tier memes and plays Bard/Nunu, hit me up!

replies.body:
Only B-tier memes, huh? I dunno about that... ;)

When are you free?

Wow, I didn't expect a response. Sad news though, I'm too addicted to the game to not play on some of my only free days, so I already got my 1000th win D:

If you're still up for B-tier memes though, hit me up, I'm b1naryb0t on NA. Weekdays are most of the time I'm free.
Ut ohhhh. That's cool, we can still play. I should be around tonight; I'll hit you up! :)
OMG I love reading when rioters respond to posts like this!  Ty for being so nice to this random stranger kateykhaos.
